<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Mortar of Hidden Meaning](/Equipment.aspx?ID=571)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Gods & Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=17) pg. 123 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 75 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 2 hands

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This matching mortar and pestle are made from immaculate darkwood that looks nearly olive in the right light.

**Activate** <actions string="" /> 1 minute (Interact);  **Frequency** once per hour;   **Effect** You use the _mortar of hidden meaning_ to grind tea leaves (or another suitable substance for making a hot beverage). While grinding the tea leaves, which takes no less than 1 minute, you can speak a message into the mortar. After the leaves are steeped in hot water, the first person who drinks from the resulting brew hears the message whispered in their ear.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
